mapper.select: select company.`id`, company.`name`, company.`province` AS provinceId, pa.`short_name` AS provinceName, company.`city` AS cityId, ca.`short_name` AS cityName, company.`district` AS districtId , da.`short_name` AS districtName, company.`address`, company.`telephone`, company.`linkman`, company.`mobile`, company.`email`, company.`zip_code`, company.`fax`, company.`job`, company.`qq`, company.`url`, company.`service_start_time`, company.`service_code`, company.`service_end_time`, company.`company_introduction` FROM sys_company company LEFT JOIN sys_area pa ON pa.`city_id` = company.`province` LEFT JOIN sys_area ca ON ca.`city_id` = company.`city` LEFT JOIN sys_area da ON da.`city_id` = company.`district` where company.`id` = #{value}
SELECT `service_code` AS serviceCode FROM sys_company where `id` = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_company where id in
#{id}
